See the Treatment Options section that follows for links to current treatment clinical trials. These have been retrieved from NCI's listing of clinical trials.",CancerGov,Pancreatic Cancer
What is (are) Bile Duct Cancer (Cholangiocarcinoma) ?,"Key Points
                    - Bile duct cancer is a rare disease in which malignant (cancer) cells form in the bile ducts.
